sub_topic: Solving systems of linear equations using matrix methods
message_1:
Solve the system of linear equations using matrix methods: 

3x + 2y - z = 5 

x - 4y + 6z = 7 

2x + y - 3z = 2
message_2:
To solve the system of linear equations using matrix methods, we will use the following steps:

1. Write the given system of linear equations in matrix form AX = B, where A is the matrix of coefficients, X is the matrix of variables, and B is the matrix of constants.
2. Find the inverse of matrix A.
3. Multiply the inverse of matrix A by matrix B to find the matrix X, which contains the values of the variables x, y, and z.

Step 1: Write the system of linear equations in matrix form AX = B

A = | 3  2 -1 |
    | 1 -4  6 |
    | 2  1 -3 |

X = | x |
    | y |
    | z |

B = | 5 |
    | 7 |
    | 2 |

Step 2: Find the inverse of matrix A

To find the inverse of matrix A, we will use the formula A^(-1) = (1/det(A)) * adj(A), where det(A) is the determinant of matrix A and adj(A) is the adjugate of matrix A.

First, find the determinant of matrix A:

det(A) = 3((-4)(-3) - (6)(1)) - 2((1)(-3) - (6)(2)) - (-1)((1)(1) - (2)(-4))
       = 3(12 - 6) - 2(-3 - 12) - (-1)(1 + 8)
       = 3(6) + 2(15) + 9
       = 18 + 30 + 9
       = 57

Now, find the adjugate of matrix A:

adj(A) = | (-4)(-3) - (6)(1)  (1)(-3) - (6)(2)  (1)(1) - (2)(-4) |
         | (2)(-3) - (-1)(1)  (3)(-3) - (-1)(-1) (3)(2) - (1)(1)  |
         | (2)(6) - (1)(1)    (3)(6) - (1)(2)   (3)(-4) - (1)(1)  |

adj(A) = | 12 - 6  -3 - 12  1 + 8 |
         | -6 + 1  -9 + 1  6 - 1  |
         | 12 - 1  18 - 2  -12 - 1 |

adj(A) = |  6  -15  9 |
         | -5  -8   5 |
         | 11  16  -13 |

Now, find the inverse of matrix A:

A^(-1) = (1/det(A)) * adj(A)

A^(-1) = (1/57) * |  6  -15  9  |
                 | -5  -8   5  |
                 | 11  16  -13 |

Step 3: Multiply the inverse of matrix A by matrix B to find the matrix X

X = A^(-1) * B

X = (1/57) * |  6  -15  9  | * | 5 |
             | -5  -8   5  |   | 7 |
             | 11  16  -13 |   | 2 |

X = (1/57) * | (6)(5) + (-15)(7) + (9)(2)  |
             | (-5)(5) + (-8)(7) + (5)(2)  |
             | (11)(5) + (16)(7) + (-13)(2)|

X = (1/57) * | 30 - 105 + 18 |
             | -25 - 56 + 10  |
             | 55 + 112 - 26  |

X = (1/57) * | -57 |
             | -71 |
             | 141 |

X = | -1 |
    | -1.2456 |
    |  2.4737 |

So, the solution to the system of linear equations is approximately x = -1, y = -1.2456, and z = 2.4737.
